pr_title: NWI-11 Punycode Internationalized Domain Names in email addresses.

timeline.message: Punycode Internationalized Domain Names in email addresses.
Added unit tests for punycoding of email addresses.
Allow gzip or deflate compression in RSNG response. Tested response size is reduced from 19MB to 3.8MB without affecting response time.

An object may be deleted from the RIPE database and a full text search matches it before its been removed from the index. (#644)

Handle this by catching the DB exception, and decrementing the result size (i.e. skip the non-existant match).

An object may be deleted from the RIPE database and an RDAP search matches it before its been removed from the full text search index. (#645)

Handle this by catching the DB exception, and continuing (i.e. skip the non-existant match).
Non-latin1 characters are substituted and not converted to Punycode properly.
Only accept US ASCII characters for email address local part.
Perform Punycode conversion on the paragraph and not on the RPSL object (i.e. before the content has been converted to latin-1)
Allow charset to be specified in Syncupdates request

timeline.bodyText: Minor: Maybe consider using StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1 instead of hardcoded string
